column4: I tried several ports, portforwarded these ports, tried many things
xchat just won't connect where smuxi and pidgin have no problem
I copied the settings from a working client and still no go
have you been playing w/ iptables or your router/
my laptop has a fixed ip from the router
well, that doesn't really matter... so does mine... did you set up some rules in your router, that might be blocking your laptop?
do you have a live cd?
well thats fine.. is it a Live USB?.. youcan boot it, surf the internet, etc?

boot the USB, and install xchat on it, and see if youcan get here from the live USB... if you can, you know it's something you've wonked around w/ on your install, if you can't, it's a setting in your router
thanks for the info, I will give that a go one time
that will at least isolate the problem.
but I still find it strange that Pidgin and Smuxi work right out the box and xchat did not
they may just be looking at different ports, and one is blocked in your router(or via iptables)
will try the stick one time and let you know when I see you again
